head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BROWNE, LAWRENCE CHASE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BROWNE, LAWRENCE CHASE

block.p: BROWNE-Lawrence Chase. On August 13th, 2000, of Brooklyn, New York, and Belle Terre, Long Island. Beloved husband of Deborah (nee Hatfield). Loving son of Dorothy C. Browne. Cherished father of Erica W. Grivas, Dorothy M. Browne, and Jennifer R. Browne. Mr. Browne was a partner of Maloof and Browne of New York City. Donations may be made to The Arthur Ashe New York Junior Tennis League of Long Island City or The Jose Carreras Leukemia Foundation of Seattle. Reposing at O.B. Davis Funeral Home, 4839 Nesconset Highway, Port Jefferson Station, Long Island. Visiting Friday 7-9. Funeral service Saturday, 12 noon at O.B. Davis. Cremation private.
